name: led python
func:
#from luma.led_matrix.device import max7219
#import max7219.led as led

#device = led.matrix()
#device.show_message("Hello world!")

import time
from luma.led_matrix.device import max7219
from luma.core.interface.serial import spi, noop
from luma.core.legacy import show_message
from luma.core.legacy.font import proportional, CP437_FONT
from luma.core.render import canvas
from luma.core.virtual import viewport

serial = spi(port=0, device=0, gpio=noop())
n = 1
block_orientation = 0
rotate = 0
inreverse = False
device = max7219(serial, cascaded=n or 1, block_orientation=block_orientation,
                     rotate=rotate or 0, blocks_arranged_in_reverse_order=inreverse)
print("Created device")

#for x in range(8):
#    for y in range(8):
#        with canvas(device) as draw:
#            print("Accendi Led  ", x, ",", y, " per 5 secondi") 
#            draw.point((x, y), fill="white")
#            time.sleep(5)

device.clear()

#for x in range(0,4,1):
#    for y in range(7,2,-1):
#        with canvas(device) as draw:
#            print("Accendi Led  ", x, ",", y, " per 5 secondi") 
#            draw.point((x, y), fill="white")
#            time.sleep(5)

print("Accendo primo sole")
with canvas(device) as draw:
    draw.point((0, 7), fill="white")
time.sleep(5)

print("Accendo prima nuvola")
with canvas(device) as draw:
    draw.point((0, 6), fill="white")
    draw.point((0, 5), fill="white")
time.sleep(5)

print("Accendo prima pioggia")
with canvas(device) as draw:
    draw.point((0, 4), fill="white")
time.sleep(5)

print("Accendo prima neve")
with canvas(device) as draw:
    draw.point((0, 3), fill="white")
time.sleep(5)

print("Accendo secondo sole")
with canvas(device) as draw:
    draw.point((1, 7), fill="white")
time.sleep(5)



print("Accendo prima riga")
for y in range(8):
    with canvas(device) as draw:
        print("Accendo led ", 0, ",", y)
        draw.point((0, y), fill="white")
        time.sleep(5)

device.clear()
device.contrast(0x80)

print("Fine")

return msg

name: clear display
func:
import time
from luma.led_matrix.device import max7219
from luma.core.interface.serial import spi, noop
from luma.core.legacy import show_message
from luma.core.legacy.font import proportional, CP437_FONT
from luma.core.render import canvas
from luma.core.virtual import viewport

serial = spi(port=0, device=0, gpio=noop())
n = 1
block_orientation = 0
rotate = 0
inreverse = False
device = max7219(serial, cascaded=n or 1, block_orientation=block_orientation,
                     rotate=rotate or 0, blocks_arranged_in_reverse_order=inreverse)

device.clear()

return msg

Switch on leds
func:
import time
import json
from luma.led_matrix.device import max7219
from luma.core.interface.serial import spi, noop
from luma.core.legacy import show_message
from luma.core.legacy.font import proportional, CP437_FONT
from luma.core.render import canvas
from luma.core.virtual import viewport

serial = spi(port=0, device=0, gpio=noop())
n = 1
block_orientation = 0
rotate = 0
inreverse = False
device = max7219(serial, cascaded=n or 1, block_orientation=block_orientation,
                     rotate=rotate or 0, blocks_arranged_in_reverse_order=inreverse)

print("Print string=",msg["icons"])
#with canvas(device) as draw:
#    draw.point((0, 7), fill="white")

#res = json.dumps(msg)
#print("res=",res)
#newres = json.loads(res)
#print("newres=",newres)

with canvas(device) as draw:
    for icon in msg[u"icons"]:
        print ("icon=", icon)
        newicon = json.loads(icon)
        #print("newnicon[x]=",newicon["x"])
        print("Switch on led at x=",newicon["x"],",y=",newicon["y"])
        draw.point((newicon["x"], newicon["y"]), fill="white")

return msg
